subject: Automobile Racing
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch has endured two wrecks in as many Nascar Sprint Cup races at Daytona International Speedway. The latest occurred with him leading in the final lap.
snippet: Kyle Busch has endured two wrecks in as many Nascar Sprint Cup races at Daytona International Speedway. The latest occurred with him leading in the final lap.
